asset.title: Hoover FloorMate Family
asset.description:
Welcome to the full Hoover FloorMate lineup. 

Check out these other instructional videos for the Hoover FloorMate:

Assembly: http://youtu.be/SiLeaBac1Dw

How To Use: http://youtu.be/ej6diWMcGlE

What's the difference between 'Wash' Mode and 'Dry' Mode?: http://youtu.be/3oP9co7qA0c

Where can I use my FloorMate? http://youtu.be/yxbx139luho

Quick Tips: http://youtu.be/IcnOlbkHYdQ

How to empty your FloorMate: http://youtu.be/7ue35tFsU_c

Cleaning your FloorMate: http://youtu.be/bbxgEhylFa0

How to store your FloorMate: http://youtu.be/bQFYFo1qr5g

Learn more: www.hooverfloormate.com
asset.author: Hoover

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Hoover FloorMate hard floor cleaners do the washing, scrubbing, and drying so you don't have to. Intuitive and easy to use. They're designed to safely and effectively clean all sealed hard floor surfaces like wood, laminate, tile, marble, final, and more. The FloorMate Washes your floor with water and solution as you push it forward and when you pull it back, powerful suction combined with a squeezing ,instantly picks up the dirty water and leaves your floor dry.

Each featuring exclusive spin scrub technology. Their counter-rotating brushes gently scrub your floors from all angles all with no more hands and knees scrubbing. Unlike the mop and bucket that pushes dirty water away, the FloorMate's dual tank technology keeps the clean and dirty water separate so only clean water touches your floor. Plus it makes filling and emptying easy and with a variety of options. From cordless cleaning to larger tanks, we have a FloorMate to meet your needs. Wash, scrub, dry, done. The Hoover FloorMate hard floor cleaner.
